程序包 com.learn.android.demos.toast

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    LifecycleCallback
    Provides callback methods on major lifecycle events of a Crouton.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Configuration
    Allows configuring a Croutons behaviour aside from the actual view, which is defined via Style.
    Configuration.Builder
    Creates a Configuration.Builder to build a Configuration upon.
    Crouton
    Displays information in a non-invasive context related manner.
    Style
    The style for a Crouton.
    Style.Builder
    Builder for the Style object.
    TypefaceSpan
    Style a spannable with a custom Typeface.
